title: Multimedia Utilization Strategy Design in Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Physical Education Theory, Field Experience, and Basic Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Targets secondary physical education teachers, aiming to enhance their ability to design and execute multimedia-based instruction.

learning_goals: Three or more instructional designs effectively integrating multimedia tools (e.g., videos, AR/VR, interactive content) in physical education classes can be developed.
Develop and apply at least two multimedia-based formative assessment tools to enhance learner engagement.
Explain strategies for managing digital resources and ensuring copyright compliance in physical education classes within a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

resources: Multimedia Authoring Tool for Physical Education Classes

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
